name: Performance Based Art
description: Studies in this advanced level course integrate history, theory and production and are designed to assist students to develop a critically informed performance practice with documentation in video and still photography. Illustrated presentations of a range of performance art practices contextualize the skills learned and concepts addressed, alongside readings, discussions and critiques. [144P]
prerequisites: Any two FAS 200 level courses, 1.5 credits in FAH/VCC/VST and P.I.
